verbs.description: President Trump [V: was] told years ago about abuse allegations against former New York attorney general Eric Schneiderman , according to a lawyer who wrote a filing in the Michael Cohen case .

[ARG2: President Trump] was [V: told] [ARGM-TMP: years ago] [ARG1: about abuse allegations against former New York attorney general Eric Schneiderman] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a lawyer who wrote a filing in the Michael Cohen case] .
President Trump was told years ago about abuse allegations against former New York attorney general Eric Schneiderman , [V: according] to a lawyer who wrote a filing in the Michael Cohen case .

President Trump was told years ago about abuse allegations against former New York attorney general Eric Schneiderman , according to [ARG0: a lawyer] [R-ARG0: who] [V: wrote] [ARG1: a filing in the Michael Cohen case] .
